title: Region defined by exp. and quartic functions part - c

content.question: Let h be the vertical distance between the graphs of f and g in region S. Find the rate at which h changes with respect to x when x=1.8.

frqParts.text: Let h be the vertical distance between the graphs of f and g in region S. Find the rate at which h changes with respect to x when x=1.8.

topic.text: 2.1: Defining Average and Instantaneous Rates of Change at a Point

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
